alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Franklin; Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL FRANKLIN, NORTHEASTERN RIPLEY AND NORTHWESTERN DEARBORN COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 215 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Batesville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Batesville, Brookville, Manchester, Sunman, St. Leon, Cedar Grove, Mount Carmel, Dover, Penntown, Weisburg, Interstate 74 at State Route 101, Sharptown, New Trenton, Lawrenceville, Saint Peter and New Alsace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
